am.mediastre.mediastreamplatformsdkandroid

Class MediastreamPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • am.mediastre.mediastreamplatformsdkandroid.MediastreamPlayer

  • public class MediastreamPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Mediastream player for LIVE and VOD from Mediastream Platform. Includes ads from VAST.

      • addPlayerCallback

        public void addPlayerCallback(MediastreamPlayerCallback callback)
        Add callbacks which will be called when the player enters and leaves fullscreen mode.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback is the implementation of the interface MediastreamPlayerCallback.

      • setPlaybackControlColor

        public void setPlaybackControlColor(int color)
        Sets the color of the buttons and seek bar.
        Parameters:
        color - a color derived from the @{link Color} class (ex. android.graphics.Color#RED).

      • addActionButton

        public void addActionButton(Drawable icon,
                   java.lang.String contentDescription,
                   View.OnClickListener onClickListener)
        Creates a button to put in the top right of the video player.
        Parameters:
        icon - The image of the action (ex. trash can).
        contentDescription - The text description this action. This is used in case the action buttons do not fit in the video player. If so, an overflow button will appear and, when clicked, it will display a list of the content descriptions for each action.
        onClickListener - The handler for when the action is triggered.

      • setFullscreenCallback

        public void setFullscreenCallback(com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback fullscreenCallback)
        Set the callback which will be called when the player enters and leaves fullscreen mode.
        Parameters:
        fullscreenCallback - The callback should hide other views in the activity when the player enters fullscreen mode and show other views when the player leaves fullscreen mode.
